plays.text: Penalty to Evgeni Nabokov 2 minutes for Interference Fredrik Modin served by Niko Dimitrakos

Goal scored by Vincent Lecavalier assisted by Dave Andreychuk and Dan Boyle

Goal scored by Ruslan Fedotenko assisted by Vaclav Prospal and Brad Lukowich
